title: How to Make Oven French Toast

steps.headline: Melt margarine in two 9-inch square baking pans.
Sprinkle sugar and cinnamon over margarine.
Mix eggs, salt, orange juice and orange rind, if used.
Dip each side of bread into mixture.
Place close together in prepared pan.
Turn and bake 5 minutes more or until desired doneness.

text: Preheat oven to 425 °F (218 °C).  Melt margarine in two 9-inch square baking pans.  Sprinkle sugar and cinnamon over margarine.  Mix eggs, salt, orange juice and orange rind, if used.  Dip each side of bread into mixture.  Place close together in prepared pan.  Bake for 15 minutes.  Turn and bake 5 minutes more or until desired doneness.  Finished.
